attributes.action: make women's pay equal to men's pay
attributes.additional_details: To help support the inequality women face daily.
attributes.background: i want the government to overlook the inequality within gender pay.

rejection.details:
It is not clear exactly what action you want the Government to take in respect of the gender pay gap. 

You could submit a new petition calling for a specific change to the current arrangements related to the gender pay gap. Find out more in this briefing from the House of Commons Library:

The gender pay gap 
https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/sn07068/
